EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date! TriTechs' Imc Solutions - Customer Golf Tournament
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Save the Date! TriTechs' Imc Solutions - Customer Golf Tournament
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
The IMC Golf Tournament has been revived! Be sure to mark your calendars and plan to attend this fun-filled event; contest and prizes to be announced.
Wednesday, October 5, 2011 12:00 PM - Shotgun l Dinner - 6:00 PM Highfields Golf Course, Grafton MA
More information to come! Contact: David Bell <David.Bell2@TriTech.com> | 774-239-3722
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road - San Diego, CA 92121
